Russian Blonde Virgin Hair is the most exclusive beautiful and rare type of hair which is why is cost more then the other types of virgin hair. Russian Blonde Hair is the purest and silkiest of all the virgin hair. The hair is of Russian Descent it is the finest of all virgin hair on the market. Our Russian Blonde Virgin Hair comes in a light blonde to a medium Blonde. The hair tend not to go darker than brown. The hair is extremely versatile and can be straightened as well as curled

name: Virgin Malaysian body wave
description:
Human Malaysian hair is one of the highest grades of hair, preferred. It has a natural moisture that gives it a healthy sheen and a frizz-free Hollywood look. It holds curls really well and can be blended by textures of all ethnicities.

Malaysian hair is a very rare hair type, and silkier than most hair. Most celebrities wear it because of its versatility and its ability to withstand extreme atmosphere change (due to traveling). Like Indian hair, it can be used more than once and is guaranteed not to shed or tangle.

•(3.5 ounces each bundle) 



Product Disclaimer

COLOR DISCLAIMER – Since our products are not processed or colored, our virgin hair comes only in the natural shades of 1B (Off Black), 2 (Darkest Brown), 3 (Dark Brown) and every color in between.  We recommend consulting a professional stylist should you consider coloring the hair. Of course our virgin hair will take and hold permanent, semi-permanent, cellophane, and lift beautifully, just like your own natural hair.

 
 •For a full head, you need about 200 to 300 grams which should be about 2 to 3 packs. 

 
 •For added beauty, use the longer inches at the back, the second to the longest inches mid way and the shorter inches in front. For example, 22" at the back, 18 inches at the middle and 16 in front. This is the modern way to wear hair extensions 

 
 •This hair will last at least a year with proper maintenance; this is from our personal experience.

name: Virgin Brazilian loose Curl
description:
This texture is completely natural and unprocessed. Its a wavy/Curly pattern. No chemicals are used whatsoever. Since this real Brazilian hair is just washed and left untreated, it may appear dry out of the package, and carry a scent. You do need to maintain it by shampooing and conditioning, using a leave-in conditioner is also recommended. Styling and maintenance is required to reap the many benefits of this virgin Brazilian hair. The hair comes to life after treatment, and gets better over time.

name: Virgin Brazilian spiral wave
description:
Brazilian Hair is the most sought after texture on the market right now. This hair is used diversely because of its softness, durability and density (thickness). This texture is easiest to blend with most ethnicities from some Caucasian textures to African American relaxed textures. Brazilian hair is extremely luxurious and very soft with a lot of body and natural shine. Its luster is low to medium.

Because of the density of Brazilian hair, you may not want to use as many bundles as you would normally use with other textures to create a full look. Due to its natural density, with this hair, less is more. Also because of its density, it is less likely to frizz than other hair types like Malaysian or Indian Hair. Brazilian hair will also hold curls longer than Indian or Malaysian textures. This hair is extremely versatile. It’s amazing!


•(3.5 ounces each bundle) the wave is achieved my steam CAN BE FLAT IRONED AND BACK WAVY!


 Brazilian hair is not to silky and not to coarse which makes it really natural if you want to blend it with your hair or not. 



Product Disclaimer

COLOR DISCLAIMER – Since our products are not processed or colored, our virgin hair comes only in the natural shades of 1B (Off Black), 2 (Darkest Brown), 3 (Dark Brown) and every color in between.  We recommend consulting a professional stylist should you consider coloring the hair. Of course our virgin hair will take and hold permanent, semi-permanent, cellophane, and lift beautifully, just like your own natural hair.

 
 •For a full head, you need about 200 to 300 grams which should be about 2 to 3 Bundles.

name: Virgin Indian Curly
description: This variety of our 100% Virgin Indian hair extension is coarser in texture, with an increase in volume. The result is a beautiful mass of loose curls, which is almost effortlessly maintained. The curls are much more defined when worn wet. Of course, our 'curly' variety can still be blown or flat-ironed straight. Our Virgin Indian hair is sold in machine wefted bundles weighing 3.5 ounce each and comes only in natural virgin colors. Available colors: natural black(1b) to natural browns.

name: Virgin Indian Straight
description: Our Indian hair is sleek and straight. It moves and flows freely and holds curls well even though it is heavy, thick, and dense. Indian hair is shiny, the texture feels very soft and smooth with lots of body. The hair dries straight with a slight wave, which can be flat ironed or set with rollers when wet for a curly or wavy look. Each bundle is. It can be dyed. Two bundles are recommended for lengths shorter than 18 inches. We recommend at least 3 bundles for lengths longer than 18 inches. name: Lace front closure/ombre Silk base closure / Silk base closure
description:
A  Lace Front Closure is a Closure that is worn with a weave to give a natural looking hair line; the Silk material creates a scalp for these closures, and therefore can be parted and styled in any matter.  What make our closures different from the rest is:

1. Our Closures are not bulky, and do not appear weavy- we worked with the best company in china, who hand crafted and customized our lace silk base closures to our specifications. This is the single most important point that makes our closures different; the size is perfect (4x4), and is designed in more of a square design rather than an oval design.  Ever looked at a person, who appear to have a lot of hair sitting on their heads, and nothing looks natural (ie. Rapper Trina Lace Wig, or Classy from Real Chance of Love Lace Wig)? Our Design and particular Measurements and Specs are what set our Lace Front Closures apart from any other company out there. 

2. Our Closures have nothing but the best quality hair, and will last through multiple installs.  Our Closures will usually last 3-6 months if properly taken care of or longer.


4. Our company does not offer a small closure and a large closure for a higher price, we have one size, and that’s it. The measurement of our closures are the perfect size of 3.5x4" .  Companies often offer both small and large in order to get more money out of a customer, often selling out of the large Closures, and having nothing but Small Closures in inventory, that don’t even compare, in terms of styling options. 

5 .Our Lace Front Closures blend very well with most skin tones. Our lace closure flesh has more of a light brown coloration as oppose to a pale flesh tone, which is found on most silk base closures. 


·Hair type - 100% Virgin Hair
 
·Dimensions - 3.5x 4"
 
·Lace Color - Light Brown
 
·Hair Color - 1b Dark brown/Black
 
·Texture - Soft
 
·Density - 120%
 
·Lengths Available – 12” - 20''
 
If you are interested in purchasing a different length, please email info.eyes4u16@gmail.com


PLEASE ALLOW 3-5 DAYS For closure to arrive to us, EACH CLOSURE HAS TO BE CUSTOM MADE.  

SILK BASE CLOSURE 

Silk Base Lace Top Closures 3.5x4" 

Brazilian Virgin Hair 

BODY WAVE 12"-20" 


Your silk top is custom made so please allow 7-10 days for it to be shipped.

name: Hair care tips
description:
Hair care 

Here at Hair4u7 we take hair care very serious! throughout the years numerous of our customers have failed to follow our Hair Care tip and destroying there beautiful hair!.
Below I will tell you how to keep your hair looking and feeling great!! Remember Less is more! 
 
Step 1: Type of Hair?
 
Hair care depends on a variety of things; one of most important of them all is texture! if your new to virgin hair I always recommend going with an easy and manageable style such as Body Wave or straight. Textures such as Curly, Kinky Curly, Loose curl, and  wavy tend to give ladies new to virgin hair a little trouble as a little shedding and tangling which is normal may occur more when these textures are neglected.
 
 
Step 2: Find a professional stylist!
 
Does he or she have 1500 hours? And updated license, no matter how good or how much a person says they know what to do if he or she does not have 1500 hours they should not be touching your hair. Most professional stylist work at salons, and has clientele to show their work. Don’t let someone ruin your investment you did wait 3-4 business days or longer and spent your hard earned money for a bad install.
 
 
Step 3: Seal your wefts!
 
Seal those wefts seal those wefts! Many complaints on virgin hair come from cutting the track line (weft) without resealing your weft. Please let your stylist know if you plan on cutting the hair please seal the wefts!
 
 
Step 4: Washing/conditioning your hair!
 
Please pay close attention to this section washing your hair is very important!! This is virgin hair and should be treated and cared for just as your hair. Below are some products to wash and condition your hair with. You should wash your hair every two weeks or when needed
 
Products are listed below
 
Design Essentials Moisturizing Shampoos and Conditioners
Crème of Nature Sulfate Free Argon Oil Conditioner
Macadamia Natural Brand Oil Shampoo and Conditioner
Organic Root Stimulator Revitalizing Conditioner (for extra dry or damaged hair)
Paul Mitchell The Detangler
Suave Professionals Sleek Moisturizing Shampoo
One 'N' Only Restorative Mask
 
Silicone mix shampoo and conditioner (highly recommended)
 
 
Step 5:  Products not to use!!! This will cause tangling shedding and matting.
 
 
•    Tresemme Shampoo and Conditioner
•    Dove Shampoo and Conditioner
•    Garnier Fructis Shampoo and Conditioner
•    White Rain Shampoo and Conditioner
•    Aussie Shampoo and Conditioner
•    V05 Shampoo and Conditioner
•    Pantene Pro-v Shampoo and Conditioner
•    Head and Shoulders Shampoo and Conditioner
•    L’Oreal Shampoo and Conditioner
Mixed Chicks Shampoo and Conditioner
 
•    Herbal Essence Shampoos, 2in1, and Conditioners
•    Organix Moroccan Shampoo/Conditioner (blue bottles)
 
 
 
Step 6: Styling your hair??
 
In addition to continuous moisture, a quality styling serum should be a staple used to calm your hair, prevent frizz, seal in your hairs moisture, and add shine.
When applying heat to your hair, always use a quality heat protectant. As your own hair; your extensions will become damaged by excessive heat. If your hair becomes heat damaged, it will lose its natural curl/wave pattern, and/or have many damaged dry or brittle ends. Heat damage cannot be reversed. Coarser textures are more prone to heat damage and dryness.
 
Step 7: Tangling and matting???
If your hair is tangling it means its DRY or has product buildup. If all of your hair is dry, then try another conditioner or regimen that works better at moisturizing your hair. All conditioners and product will not work well with every bundle. Each bundles comes from a single donor and May or may not respond well to your regimen. If one or more of your bundles is tangling, deep condition your hair with a rich conditioner or mask and allow it to sit on the hair for at least an hour. If your hair responds well to a deep condition and stops tangling, then continue to deep condition as often as your hair needs it. If your hair does not respond well to a deep condition, you will need to try a product that agrees with your hair. You may have a bundle of hair that doesn’t act or respond like the others. It doesn’t mean your bundle is "bad". It means that you will need to find a regimen that agrees with that bundle until they all cooperate harmoniously. If your hair has product buildup, wash your hair with a clarifying or sulfate free shampoo and recondition your hair as normal.

***ALSO WHEN COMBING OUT THE HAIR WHILE WET USE A WIDE TOOTH COMB! You don't want anything with small teeth pulling out your Hair! This will cause shedding!


Virgin hair (especially curly hair) is very high maintenance. If you aren't willing to maintain you’re hairs moisture and cleanliness or taking the time to find a good regimen?  You may want to consider another texture. Curly hair is definitely for advanced-intermediate Virgin hair wearers and extremely different than caring for hair from your local Beauty Supply Store.
 
 DYING/COLORING THE HAIR

I RECOMMEND A PROFESSIONAL when getting the hair colored. Don't mess up your investment with the wrong type of dyes and harsh bleach!  
 
If all of these steps are followed! You will never have a problem out of your hair if you do and if you have it documented please email or call us during normal business hours for more tips.
 
Info.Eyes4u16@gmail.com

name: FAQs
description: Hello Beauties! Welcome to our site!. We are here to promise and give you the best customer service! Any questions please inform me. We respond promptly. Each bundle is 3.5 oz. It is our promise to provide you with quality hair! I do not sale hair that I can not wear or dislike! I provide you with real VIRGIN HAIR! Although the hairs are from individual donors, it does not have a smell! this hair is very clean. There is minimum to no shedding which if you like you can seal your weft. With proper care It will not tangle. EXTENSION CARE This hair can last for one year or longer with proper care. The hair gets better after every wash and condition! If you have installation questions or not sure of how many bundles you need, PLEASE CONTACT YOUR STYLIST! THE LENGTH: In order to avoid any misunderstanding about the length of our hair, we declare that the way we use to measure length of hair (straight,wave or curly texture....)is to stretched. Meanwhile, since the length is measure by hand, it is unavoidable that there will be small inaccuracy(0.1 to 0.3 inches is acceptable). SERVICES Hair4u does offer ombre coloring services. An extra fee will be applied. If you would like longer lengths please contact me and I can do a special order for you. SPECIAL ORDER ITEMS Hair longer than 22" may not be in stock, and is available upon request. Once a order is placed I will put in a special order for you which will take approximately 3 days to arrive to me. If there is no hold up with customs. WHOLESALE Not at this time. How many bundles do I need? Length(Inch) Weight/Bundle 12" 100g/3.5oz 2 bundles 14" 100g/3.5oz 2 bundles 16" 100g/3.5oz 3bundles 18" 100g/3.5oz 3bundles 20" 100g/3.5oz 3bundles 22" 100g/3.5oz 3bundles 24" 100g/3.5oz 4 bundles 26" 100g/3.5oz 4 bundles 28" 100g/3.5oz 4 bundles 30" 100g/3.5oz 4 bundles DOES HAIR4u have a store No we do not, all orders are placed online no exceptions. IS OUR HAIR REAL? LADIES YES!! 100% REAL OTHER SUPPLIERS CAN AND WILL NOT SHOW YOU WHERE THEY ARE GETTING THEIR HAIR FROM BECAUSE IT IS NOT WHAT THEY SAY IT IS! WE HAVE AUTHENTIC INDIAN HAIR! THE PROOF IS IN THE HAIR!

name: Shipping & Return policy
description:
After you have placed your order, we will check our inventory and then send you email IF NEEDED telling you of any delays, if you do not receive a email from us please don't worry about anything. Your package will be on the way soon, and You will then be waiting for your tracking number.

If NO DELAYS, AFTER PAYMENT HAIR WILL BE MAILED ON THE THIRD BUSINESS DAY.

The total time it will take to receive an item is determined by adding the time shown in its shipping message to the number of days your shipping method will take. By selecting USPS regular shipping your estimated delivery time is 1-3 days. Regular shipping is $15
 
during specific promotional events delivery times may vary because hair may not be in stock at the time of purchase and/or other orders are needed to be processed in order in which they are received. 

ORDER CANCELLATIONS
All hair 10"-20" can be cancelled before it ships out and there will be A $70 restocking fee
 

SPECIAL ORDER ITEMS
on longer hair 22"-30" is a special order ( I order upon request) once ordered it will arrive 3-5 days after purchase. Once it arrives to me I will then mail it to you. (If no custom delays) The 3-5 days also includes the processing time of your payment. Please note we DO NOT carry long lengths in stock, so once you place your order there will be no returns or cancellations. Please make sure you are comfortable with the process before you place an special order. 

Not all products are in stock or located in our facility and may take time to come from a third-party supplier. Since our merchandise can ship from a different facility to us if we are out of stock, the time and day that you place your order may affect when your order is ready to ship, the estimated time of delivery and the method of delivery required for the product to reach you in the time needed. Also, our facility nor any third-party suppliers are open 24 hours 7 days a week. For example, an order placed Saturday afternoon may not ship until Monday morning.


Some cases It takes 1-4 business days to process your order. Our shipping days are Monday through Friday, excluding weekends and holidays. We do NOT process and ship orders the same day. Please allow up to 4 business days for orders to process (If you order on Monday, your order should ship out on Tuesday or Wednesday). If you place an order after business hours on Friday or at anytime on Saturday, orders will be processed to ship out on Monday, according to availability of the merchandise ordered. You will receive a tracking number once your order ships.
 
 
INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
 International customers (outside of United States) are responsible for all import duties, customs, and local taxes charged by your country. We have no way of knowing what the fees or taxes may be, we recommend that you contact your country's customs office or tax agent for respective charges and rates on a package coming outside of your country.
 
NOTE: From time to time, international shipping to some countries can take 4-6 weeks. Even longer for some slow-to-ship countries. We are not responsible for any delays caused by destination country's customs clearance processes.
 
TRACKING YOUR ORDER
Once your payment has cleared, you will receive an e-mail when your order has been processed (this may take up to 48 hours). You will receive a second confirmation e-mail once your order has shipped which will include your tracking number and a link to follow the journey of your package.
 

If there is a problem with your tracking number or package delivery, please contact the courier directly
prior to contacting us. Please allow 1 – 4 days for the tracking information to show. Here is the contact
information for each method of shipping offered to you:
 
ONCE PACKAGE IS MAIL I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE 

USPS – www.usps.com (1-800-222-1811)

We cannot be held responsible for any customs fees that may be assessed to your order.

Lost, Damaged, or Delayed Orders
We are not responsible for items lost, stolen or damaged in transit to you. Therefore we strongly suggest you consider adding insurance coverage to your order. Insurance is available for $2.50 per $100 dollars in package value.

Any order that has not been received 30 days after the shipping date is considered a lost order. Lost, stolen, or damaged orders will be replaced ONLY if the customer purchased insurance at the time the order was placed. We consider any order to have been received when the delivery status for the package is "Delivered".

If merchandise is lost in transit, it will be replaced only after the shipment has been traced (provided that the order was insured at the time of shipment) Upon confirmation of non-delivery, a claim will be filed and the merchandise will be replaced or the you will be issued a credit (minus the shipping costs). We are not responsible for uninsured shipments which are lost or damaged in transit.

We accept no responsibility or liability for shipping delays which are as a result of errors on the part of the shipping carrier.

Signature Confirmation
You will be responsible for your order if you decline signature confirmation.

RETURNS

Due to the nature of the product there is NO RETURN OR EXCHANGES, because of sanitary reasons. So please ask your stylist for advice before making your final decision IF YOU ALTER THE HAIR WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE! NO RETURNS ON SPECIAL OREDER NO EXCEPTIONS!

name: WHOLESALE
description:
Hair4u has put together the perfect wholesale packages to help your New hair business grow. Most company require you purchase 1Kilo! We allow you to start with just 5 bundles!!! these prices include any hair you would like! NO MONTHLY FEES OR START UP FEE!! 


ONCE YOU GET TO THE CHECK OUT SECTION BEFORE PAYMENT PLEASE ENTER THE TYPE OF HAIR YOU WOULD LIKE IN THE NOTE TO SELLER!! FAILURE TO DO SO WILL DELAY YOUR ORDER FROM BEING SENT OUT! 

IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO CUSTOMIZE A PACKAGE PLEASE EMAIL US AT INFO.EYES4U16@GMAIL.COM


NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES NO EXCEPTIONS! So please make sure your order is correct before you order.

name: CREAM SHINE LIPGLOSS
description:
PLEASE VISIT WWW.jUICYLIPGLOSS.BIGCARTEL.COM TO PLACE YOUR ORDER

Our cream shine combines high intensity pigments with moisturizing agents for long lasting, vibrant, and absolutely gorgeous lips. 💋

name: 2 Bundle Deals with Lace Closure
description:
Hair is Tangle Free. Minimum to No shedding. Soft throughout. Hair can be Straightened, Curled, Dyed to your delight! And will return to the natural wave/curl pattern.

ALL HAIR COMES IN 1B

Hair lengths 24" and longer is special order please see FAQ's and/or Shipping information. Closures are custom made after purchase please allow 2-4 days to arrive.

*For bundle deals with longer hair and closure please contact customer services using the contact us form
